name: The Search Begins
description:
Enter the Block Hunter state for a period of time. While in this state, you will be able to mine multiple blocks at once.
When the effect expires, consume all Collector Meter points to grant additional Damage, Hunger, and Movement Speed to nearby friendly entities based on the amount of points in each Collector Meter.
ã€€

text:
Meter Point Threshold: 24
Block Hunter Duration: 10 seconds
Damage Dealt: +2/24 points
Hunger: +3/24 points
Movement Speed: +20%/24 points
Range: 32 blocks
Buff Duration: 20 seconds
Cooldown: 30 seconds
